attributes.action: Prime Minister David Cameron to trigger article 50 before October 2016.
attributes.additional_details:
PM has resigned as of october 2016.
Mulitable members of the remain camp have resigned.
Stalling this process will only damage our economy and country.
Parliment should do the job they where voted in to do and not leave it for 3 months.
attributes.background: The people of the United Kingdom have voted to leave the EU following the referendum in June 2016. Delaying the progress is harming our country and is just a polictal move by the remain camps. We had a fair and democratic vote. The people of this country have voted for what they believe is right.
